text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium madriti is an anamorph species of the genus of Penicillium which produces orsellinic acid.
text.Further reading:
Majeed, S.; Nanda, A. (2013). "Synthesis and bactericidal effect of silver nanoparticles from Penicillium madriti (MTCC2804) and evaluate in combination with sparfloxacin". International Conference on Advanced Nanomaterials & Emerging Engineering Technologies. p. 58. doi:10.1109/ICANMEET.2013.6609233. ISBN 978-1-4799-1379-4.
Atta-ur-Rahman (1998). Structure and Chemistry (Part F), Band 20. Elsevier. ISBN 0-08-054199-2.
P. K. Stumpf (2014). Lipids: Structure and Function: The Biochemistry of Plants. Elsevier. ISBN 1-4832-2034-6.
